name: Two and a Half Dino Men
name_original: Two and a Half Dino Men
description:
Historical inaccuracies abound in this tale of dinotaurs and disaster! Join paleontologist Dr. Dana Al Jamil as she comes face to face with her life's work, or at least *half* of it (the lower half). Dr. Al Jamil will need to put her faith in her friends if she ever wants to get home, and who knows, maybe a special someone will come with her?

This is the second visual novel by Staci McIntyre, author of the webcomics Bendy Straw Vampires and Loneliest Princess.

Music by Louie Zong (bandcamp link!)!
